trans-unit.source: Note that based on the DocumentType given to create the document, the implementation may instantiate specialized Document objects that support additional features than the "Core", such as "HTML" [DOM Level 2 HTML] . On the other hand, setting the DocumentType after the document was created makes this very unlikely to happen. Alternatively, specialized Document creation methods, such as createHTMLDocument [DOM Level 2 HTML] , can be used to obtain specific types of Document objects.
trans-unit.target: 注意，基于为创建 DocumentType 指定的DocumentType，该实现可以实例化专用的 Document 对象，该对象支持除“ Core”之外的其他功能，例如“ HTML” [ DOM Level 2 HTML ]。另一方面，在创建 DocumentType 后设置DocumentType使得这种情况极不可能发生。或者，可以使用诸如 createHTMLDocument [ DOM Level 2 HTML ]之类的专用 Document 创建方法来获取特定类型的 Document 对象。

trans-unit.source: Note that based on the DocumentType given to create the document, the implementation may instantiate specialized Document objects that support additional features than the "Core", such as "HTML" [DOM Level 2 HTML] . On the other hand, setting the DocumentType after the document was created makes this very unlikely to happen. Alternatively, specialized Document creation methods, such as createHTMLDocument [DOM Level 2 HTML] , can be used to obtain specific types of Document objects.
trans-unit.target: 注意，基于为创建 DocumentType 指定的DocumentType，该实现可以实例化专用的 Document 对象，该对象支持除“ Core”之外的其他功能，例如“ HTML” [ DOM Level 2 HTML ]。另一方面，在创建 DocumentType 后设置DocumentType使得这种情况极不可能发生。或者，可以使用诸如 createHTMLDocument [ DOM Level 2 HTML ]之类的专用 Document 创建方法来获取特定类型的 Document 对象。

trans-unit.source: Note that because Calendar.add(int, int) is using int, Duration with values beyond the range of int in its fields will cause overflow/underflow to the given Calendar. XMLGregorianCalendar.add(Duration) provides the same basic operation as this method while avoiding the overflow/underflow issues.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，由于 Calendar.add(int, int) 使用的是 int ，因此 Duration 字段中其值超出 int 范围的值将导致给定 Calendar 的上溢/下溢。 XMLGregorianCalendar.add(Duration) 提供与此方法相同的基本操作，同时避免了上溢/下溢问题。

trans-unit.source: Note that because cancellations due to interrupts and timeouts may occur at any time, a true return does not guarantee that some other thread will acquire before the current thread. Likewise, it is possible for another thread to win a race to enqueue after this method has returned false, due to the queue being empty.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，由于中断和超时导致的取消可能随时发生，因此返回 true 不能保证某些其他线程将在当前线程之前获取。同样，由于此队列为空，因此在此方法返回 false 之后，另一个线程也有可能赢得竞争。

trans-unit.source: Note that because the SQL JOIN must be enforced when an application adds a second or subsequent RowSet object, there may be an initial degradation in performance while the JOIN is being performed.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，由于SQL JOIN 当应用程序增加了第二个或后续必须执行 RowSet 对象，有可能是在性能初始降解而 JOIN 正在执行。

trans-unit.source: Note that because the XML DTD is strongly tied to the parsing process and has a significant effect on the parsing process, it is impossible to define the DTD validation as a process independent from parsing. For this reason, this specification does not define the semantics for the XML DTD. This doesn't prohibit implementors from implementing it in a way they see fit, but users are warned that any DTD validation implemented on this interface necessarily deviate from the XML DTD semantics as defined in the XML 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，由于XML DTD与解析过程紧密相关，并且对解析过程有重大影响，因此不可能将DTD验证定义为独立于解析的过程。因此，本规范未定义XML DTD的语义。这并不禁止实现者以他们认为合适的方式实现它，但是警告用户，在此接口上实现的任何DTD验证都必须偏离XML 1.0中定义的XML DTD语义。

trans-unit.source: Note that because the numbering of elements in an array starts at zero, the array element that corresponds to placeholder parameter number
trans-unit.target: 请注意,由于数组中元素的编号从零开始,所以对应占位符参数号的数组元素为

trans-unit.source: Note that calling plus followed by minus is not guaranteed to return the same date-time.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，调用 plus 后跟 minus 并不能保证返回相同的日期时间。

trans-unit.source: Note that calling this method from within the run method of a repeating timer task absolutely guarantees that the timer task will not run again.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，从重复计时器任务的 run 方法中调用此方法绝对保证计时器任务不会再次运行。

trans-unit.source: Note that calling this method from within the run method of a timer task that was invoked by this timer absolutely guarantees that the ongoing task execution is the last task execution that will ever be performed by this timer.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,从被这个定时器调用的定时器任务的run方法内调用这个方法,绝对可以保证正在进行的任务执行是这个定时器的最后一次任务执行。

trans-unit.source: Note that calling this method may cause this DataBuffer object to be incompatible with performance optimizations used by some implementations (such as caching an associated image in video memory).
trans-unit.target: 请注意，调用此方法可能导致此 DataBuffer 对象与某些实现所使用的性能优化（例如，将关联的图像缓存在视频内存中）不兼容。

trans-unit.source: Note that changes to the backing collection might still be possible, and if they occur, they are visible through the unmodifiable view. Thus, an unmodifiable view collection is not necessarily immutable. However, if the backing collection of an unmodifiable view is effectively immutable, or if the only reference to the backing collection is through an unmodifiable view, the view can be considered effectively immutable.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,对后盾集合的更改仍然可能,如果发生更改,则通过不可修改的视图可见。因此,不可修改的视图集合不一定是不可改变的。然而,如果一个不可修改视图的支持集合是有效地不可修改的,或者如果对支持集合的唯一引用是通过一个不可修改的视图,那么可以认为该视图是有效地不可修改的。

trans-unit.source: Note that class Record is not a record type and thus invoking this method on class Record returns false.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， Record 类不是记录类型，因此在 Record 类上调用此方法将返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: Note that cloning an immutable subtree results in a mutable copy, but the children of an EntityReference clone are readonly . In addition, clones of unspecified Attr nodes are specified. And, cloning Document, DocumentType, Entity, and Notation nodes is implementation dependent.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，克隆不可变子树会导致可变的副本，但是 EntityReference 克隆的子级是readonly。此外，还指定了未指定 Attr 节点的克隆。并且，克隆 Document ， DocumentType ， Entity 和 Notation 节点取决于实现。

trans-unit.source: Note that data-related DTD declarations (unparsed entities and notations) are already reported through the DTDHandler interface.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，已经通过 DTDHandler 接口报告了与数据相关的DTD声明（未解析的实体和表示法）。

trans-unit.source: Note that despite this exclusion, multiple inherited methods with the same signature can be present in the returned list, but at most one can be a member of a ClassType. See JLS section 8.4.6 for details.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，尽管排除了这种情况，但在返回的列表中仍可以存在多个具有相同签名的继承方法，但最多只能是 ClassType 的成员。有关详细信息，请参见JLS第8.4.6节。

trans-unit.source: Note that different image format readers may produce decoded pixels in a variety of different orders. Many readers will produce pixels in a simple top-to-bottom, left-to-right-order, but others may use multiple passes of interlacing, tiling, etc. The sequence of updates may even differ from call to call depending on network speeds, for example. A call to this method does not guarantee that all the specified pixels have actually been updated, only that some activity has taken place within some subregion of the one specified.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,不同的图像格式阅读器可能会以各种不同的顺序产生解码像素。许多读取器会以简单的从上到下、从左到右的顺序生成像素,但其他的读取器可能会使用多道交错、平铺等方式。例如,根据网络速度的不同,每次调用的更新顺序甚至会有所不同。对该方法的调用并不能保证所有指定的像素实际上都被更新了,只能保证在指定的某个子区域内发生了一些活动。

trans-unit.source: Note that digest objects can compute only one digest (see MessageDigest), so that in order to compute intermediate digests, a caller should retain a handle onto the digest object, and clone it for each digest to be computed, leaving the orginal digest untouched.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，摘要对象只能计算一个摘要（请参阅 MessageDigest ），因此，为了计算中间摘要，调用者应保留摘要对象上的句柄，并为要计算的每个摘要克隆它的句柄，而保持原始摘要不变。

trans-unit.source: Note that digest objects can compute only one digest (see MessageDigest), so that in order to compute intermediate digests, a caller should retain a handle onto the digest object, and clone it for each digest to be computed, leaving the original digest untouched.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，摘要对象只能计算一个摘要（请参阅 MessageDigest ），因此，为了计算中间摘要，调用者应保留摘要对象上的句柄，并为要计算的每个摘要克隆它的句柄，而保持原始摘要不变。

trans-unit.source: Note that during the closure phase, a SSLEngine may generate handshake closure data that must be sent to the peer. wrap() must be called to generate this data. When this method returns true, no more outbound data will be created.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在关闭阶段， SSLEngine 可能会生成必须发送到对等方的握手关闭数据。必须调用 wrap() 来生成此数据。当此方法返回true时，将不再创建出站数据。

trans-unit.source: Note that during the drag, the set of operations exposed by the source at the start of the drag operation may not change until the operation is complete. The operation(s) are constant for the duration of the operation with respect to the DragSource.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在拖动过程中，在拖动操作开始之前由源公开的操作集可能不会更改，直到操作完成为止。相对于 DragSource 而言，操作在操作期间是恒定的。

trans-unit.source: Note that elements of certain kinds can be isolated using methods in ElementFilter.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，可以使用 ElementFilter 中的方法隔离某些类型的元素。

trans-unit.source: Note that elements of certain kinds can be isolated using methods in ElementFilter.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，可以使用 ElementFilter 中的方法隔离某些类型的元素。

trans-unit.source: Note that entropy is obtained from an entropy source. While some data in params may contain entropy, its main usage is to provide diversity.
trans-unit.target: 注意，熵是从熵源获得的。尽管 params 某些数据可能包含熵，但其主要用途是提供多样性。

trans-unit.source: Note that even if a protocol is enabled, it may never be used. This can occur if the peer does not support the protocol, or its use is restricted, or there are no enabled cipher suites supported by the protocol.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,即使启用了协议,它也可能永远不会被使用。如果对等体不支持该协议,或其使用受到限制,或该协议不支持任何已启用的密码套件,就会出现这种情况。

trans-unit.source: Note that even if a suite is enabled, it may never be used. This can occur if the peer does not support it, or its use is restricted, or the requisite certificates (and private keys) for the suite are not available, or an anonymous suite is enabled but authentication is required.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,即使启用了一个套件,它也可能永远不会被使用。如果对等体不支持它,或者它的使用受到限制,或者套件的必要证书(和私钥)不可用,或者启用了匿名套件但需要进行身份验证,就会出现这种情况。

trans-unit.source: Note that even if the security manager does not permit the getProperties operation, it may choose to permit the getProperty(String) operation.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，即使安全管理器不允许 getProperties 操作，它也可以选择允许 getProperty(String) 操作。

trans-unit.source: Note that even if the security manager does not permit the getProperties operation, it may choose to permit the getProperty(String) operation.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，即使安全管理器不允许 getProperties 操作，它也可以选择允许 getProperty(String) 操作。

trans-unit.source: Note that even if this method returns false, layout processing may still be invoked when used with any Font for which hasLayoutAttributes() returns true, so that method will need to be consulted for the specific font, in order to obtain an answer which accounts for such font attributes.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，即使此方法返回 false ，当与 hasLayoutAttributes() 返回 true 的任何 Font 一起使用时，布局处理仍可能会被调用，因此需要为特定字体咨询该方法，以获得占这样的字体属性。

trans-unit.source: Note that fail-fast behavior cannot be guaranteed as it is, generally speaking, impossible to make any hard guarantees in the presence of unsynchronized concurrent modification. Fail-fast operations throw ConcurrentModificationException on a best-effort basis. Therefore, it would be wrong to write a program that depended on this exception for its correctness:
trans-unit.target: 请注意，不能保证快速故障行为，因为通常来说，在存在不同步的并发修改的情况下，不可能做出任何严格的保证。快速失败操作会尽最大努力抛出 ConcurrentModificationException 。因此，编写依赖于此异常的程序的正确性是错误的：

trans-unit.source: Note that for a particular enum type T, the implicitly declared public static T valueOf(String) method on that enum may be used instead of this method to map from a name to the corresponding enum constant. All the constants of an enum type can be obtained by calling the implicit public static T[] values() method of that type.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，对于特定的枚举类型 T ，可以使用对该枚举上隐式声明的 public static T valueOf(String) 方法来代替此方法，以从名称映射到相应的枚举常量。可以通过调用该类型的隐式 public static T[] values() 方法来获取枚举类型的所有常量。

trans-unit.source: Note that for add, subtract, and multiply, the reduction in scale will equal the number of digit positions of the exact result which are discarded. If the rounding causes a carry propagation to create a new high-order digit position, an additional digit of the result is discarded than when no new digit position is created.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,对于加、减、乘,比例的减少将等于被丢弃的精确结果的位数。如果四舍五入导致传播创建了一个新的高阶数字位置,那么比没有创建新的数字位置时多丢弃了一个结果的数字。

trans-unit.source: Note that for beans which are applets, it is the caller's responsiblity to call "start" on the applet. For correct behaviour, this should be done after the applet has been added into a visible AWT container.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,对于小程序的bean,调用 "start "是调用者的责任。为了保证正确的行为,这应该在applet被添加到一个可见的AWT容器中之后进行。

trans-unit.source: Note that formats that return false from this method may nonetheless allow tiling (
trans-unit.target: 请注意，从此方法返回 false 的格式可能仍允许平铺（

trans-unit.source: Note that formatting need not occur synchronously. It may be delayed until a LogRecord is actually written to an external sink.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,格式化不需要同步进行。它可能会被延迟,直到日志记录被实际写入外部汇。

trans-unit.source: Note that if delim is null, this constructor does not throw an exception. However, trying to invoke other methods on the resulting StringTokenizer may result in a NullPointerException.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果 delim 为 null ，则此构造方法不会引发异常。但是，尝试在生成的 StringTokenizer 上调用其他方法可能会导致 NullPointerException 。

trans-unit.source: Note that if index is greater than length the value returned may be meaningless.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果 index 大于 length ,则返回的值可能没有意义。

trans-unit.source: Note that if a null command string was passed to the constructor for this ActionEvent, this this method returns null.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果将 null 命令字符串传递给此 ActionEvent 的构造方法，则此方法返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: Note that if a given implementation is not cloneable, it is still possible to compute intermediate digests by instantiating several instances, if the number of digests is known in advance.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,如果一个给定的实现是不可克隆的,如果事先知道摘要的数量,还是可以通过实例化几个实例来计算中间摘要。

trans-unit.source: Note that if a method returns int[], this will be represented by the string "[I" returned by Class.getName(), but if a method returns List<int[]>, this will be represented by the string "java.util.List<int[]>".
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果方法返回 int[] ，则将由 Class.getName() 返回的字符串 "[I" 表示；但是，如果方法返回 List<int[]> ，则将由字符串 "java.util.List<int[]>" 表示.util.List <int []>”。

trans-unit.source: Note that if a method returns int[], this will be represented by the string "[I" returned by Class.getName(), but if a method returns List<int[]>, this will be represented by the string "java.util.List<int[]>".
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果方法返回 int[] ，则将由 Class.getName() 返回的字符串 "[I" 表示；但是，如果方法返回 List<int[]> ，则将由字符串 "java.util.List<int[]>" 表示.util.List <int []>”。

trans-unit.source: Note that if a processor supports "*" and returns true, all annotations are claimed. Therefore, a universal processor being used to, for example, implement additional validity checks should return false so as to not prevent other such checkers from being able to run.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果处理器支持 "*" 并返回 true ，则声明所有注释。因此，用于例如执行附加有效性检查的通用处理器应返回 false ，以防止其他此类检查器无法运行。

trans-unit.source: Note that if a processor supports "*" and returns true, all annotations are claimed. Therefore, a universal processor being used to, for example, implement additional validity checks should return false so as to not prevent other such checkers from being able to run.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果处理器支持 "*" 并返回 true ，则声明所有注释。因此，用于例如执行附加有效性检查的通用处理器应返回 false ，以防止其他此类检查器无法运行。

trans-unit.source: Note that if an attribute was defaulted (!isSpecified()) it will of necessity also have been declared (isDeclared()) in the DTD. Similarly if an attribute's type is anything except CDATA, then it must have been declared.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果默认属性（！isSpecified（）），则也必须在DTD中将其声明为（isDeclared（））。同样，如果属性的类型是除CDATA之外的任何其他类型，则必须已声明该属性。

trans-unit.source: Note that if an element is null, then "null" is added.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果元素为null，则添加 "null" 。

trans-unit.source: Note that if an individual element is null, then "null" is added.
trans-unit.target: 注意，如果单个元素为 null ，则添加 "null" 。

trans-unit.source: Note that if any other secondary loop is started while this loop is running, the blocked thread will not resume execution until the nested loop is terminated.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,如果在这个循环运行时启动了任何其他的二级循环,被阻塞的线程将不会恢复执行,直到嵌套循环被终止。

trans-unit.source: Note that if any step fails, it will fallback to the next step. There's only one exception, if the shared state step fails and useFirstPass = true, no user prompt is made.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果任何步骤失败，它将回退到下一步。只有一个例外，如果共享状态步骤失败并且 useFirstPass = true ，则不会发出用户提示。

trans-unit.source: Note that if both the integer quotient and remainder are needed, this method is faster than using the divideToIntegralValue and remainder methods separately because the division need only be carried out once.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果同时需要整数商和余数，则此方法比分别使用 divideToIntegralValue 和 remainder 方法要快，因为除法只需要执行一次。

trans-unit.source: Note that if it is important that the elements for a given key appear in the order they appear in the source, then we cannot use a concurrent reduction, as ordering is one of the casualties of concurrent insertion. We would then be constrained to implement either a sequential reduction or a merge-based parallel reduction.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,如果一个给定的键的元素按照它们在源中出现的顺序出现是很重要的,那么我们就不能使用并发还原,因为排序是并发插入的牺牲品之一。这样我们就会被限制在实现顺序还原或基于合并的并行还原。

trans-unit.source: Note that if no transform is applied to the gradient when it is created, the identity transform is used.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,如果在创建梯度时没有对它进行变换,则使用身份变换。

trans-unit.source: Note that if no type is set, the JOIN will automatically be an inner join. The comments for the fields in the JoinRowSet interface explain these JOIN types, which are standard SQL JOIN types.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果未设置任何类型，则 JOIN 将自动为内部联接。 JoinRowSet 接口中字段的注释说明了这些 JOIN 类型，它们是标准的SQL JOIN 类型。

trans-unit.source: Note that if one of the arguments is null, a NullPointerException may or may not be thrown depending on what ordering policy, if any, the Comparator chooses to have for null values.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果参数之一为 null ，则可能会抛出 NullPointerException ,也可能不会抛出NullPointerException，这取决于 Comparator 选择具有 null 值的排序策略（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: Note that if one of the arguments is null, a NullPointerException may or may not be thrown depending on what ordering policy, if any, the Comparator chooses to have for null values.

trans-unit.source: Note that if proxy interfaces with a mix of accessibilities -- for example, an exported public interface and a non-exported non-public interface -- are proxied by the same instance, then the proxy class's accessibility is governed by the least accessible proxy interface.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,如果具有混合可访问性的代理接口--例如,导出的公共接口和非导出的非公共接口--被同一个实例代理,那么代理类的可访问性就由最小可访问性的代理接口来管理。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the Runnable.run method throws an uncaught exception (on the event dispatching thread) it's caught and rethrown, as an InvocationTargetException, on the caller's thread.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果 Runnable.run 方法（在事件调度线程上）引发未捕获的异常，则会在调用者的线程上将其作为 InvocationTargetException 捕获并重新抛出。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the argument is equal to the value of Integer.MIN_VALUE, the most negative representable int value, the result is that same value, which is negative.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果参数等于 Integer.MIN_VALUE 的值（最负的可表示 int 值），则结果是相同的值，该值为负。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the argument is equal to the value of Integer.MIN_VALUE, the most negative representable int value, the result is that same value, which is negative. In contrast, the absExact(int) method throws an ArithmeticException for this value.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果参数等于 Integer.MIN_VALUE 的值（最负的可表示 int 值），则结果是相同的值，该值为负。相反， absExact(int) 方法为此值引发 ArithmeticException 。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the argument is equal to the value of Long.MIN_VALUE, the most negative representable long value, the result is that same value, which is negative.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果参数等于 Long.MIN_VALUE 的值（最负的可表示 long 值），则结果是相同的值，该值为负。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the argument is equal to the value of Long.MIN_VALUE, the most negative representable long value, the result is that same value, which is negative. In contrast, the absExact(long) method throws an ArithmeticException for this value.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果参数等于 Long.MIN_VALUE 的值（最负的可表示 long 值），则结果是相同的值，该值为负。相反， absExact(long) 方法为此值抛出 ArithmeticException 。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the client application has not specified an explicit source method name and source class name, then the LogRecord class will infer them automatically when they are first accessed (due to a call on getSourceMethodName or getSourceClassName) by analyzing the call stack. Therefore, if a logging Handler wants to pass off a LogRecord to another thread, or to transmit it over RMI, and if it wishes to subsequently obtain method name or class name information it should call one of getSourceClassName or getSourceMethodName to force the values to be filled in.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,如果客户端应用程序没有指定显式的源方法名和源类名,那么当它们第一次被访问时(由于对getSourceMethodName或getSourceClassName的调用),LogRecord类将通过分析调用栈自动推断出它们。因此,如果一个日志处理程序想要将一个LogRecord传递给另一个线程,或者通过RMI进行传输,如果想要后续获取方法名或类名信息,就应该调用getSourceClassName或getSourceMethodName中的一个来强制填写这些值。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the event parameter is null the behavior is unspecified and may result in an exception.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果事件参数为 null ,则行为未指定，并且可能导致异常。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the given input stream does not support mark and reset, this method will consume the entire input stream.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果给定的输入流不支持 mark 和 reset ，则此方法将消耗整个输入流。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the given input stream does not support mark and reset, this method will consume the entire input stream. Otherwise, each call to this method consumes one CRL and the read position of the input stream is positioned to the next available byte after the inherent end-of-CRL marker. If the data in the input stream does not contain an inherent end-of-CRL marker (other than EOF) and there is trailing data after the CRL is parsed, a CRLException is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果给定的输入流不支持 mark 和 reset ，则此方法将消耗整个输入流。否则，对此方法的每次调用都将消耗一个CRL，并且输入流的读取位置将定位在固有CRL结束标记之后的下一个可用字节。如果输入流中的数据不包含固有的CRL结束标记（EOF除外），并且在解析CRL之后存在尾随数据，则将引发 CRLException 。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the given input stream does not support mark and reset, this method will consume the entire input stream. Otherwise, each call to this method consumes one certificate and the read position of the input stream is positioned to the next available byte after the inherent end-of-certificate marker. If the data in the input stream does not contain an inherent end-of-certificate marker (other than EOF) and there is trailing data after the certificate is parsed, a CertificateException is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果给定的输入流不支持 mark 和 reset ，则此方法将消耗整个输入流。否则，对此方法的每次调用都会消耗一个证书，并且输入流的读取位置将定位在固有证书末尾标记之后的下一个可用字节。如果输入流中的数据不包含固有的证书结束标记（EOF除外），并且在解析证书后存在尾随数据，则抛出 CertificateException 。

If the data in the input stream does not contain an inherent end-of-CRL marker (other than EOF) and there is trailing data after the CRL is parsed, a CRLException is thrown.

trans-unit.source: Note that if the given input stream does not support mark and reset, this method will consume the entire input stream. Otherwise, each call to this method consumes one certificate and the read position of the input stream is positioned to the next available byte after the inherent end-of-certificate marker. If the data in the input stream does not contain an inherent end-of-certificate marker (other than EOF) and there is trailing data after the certificate is parsed, a CertificateException is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果给定的输入流不支持 mark 和 reset ，则此方法将消耗整个输入流。否则，对此方法的每次调用都将消耗一个证书，并且输入流的读取位置将定位在固有证书末尾标记之后的下一个可用字节。如果输入流中的数据不包含固有的证书结束标记（EOF除外），并且在解析证书后存在尾随数据，则抛出 CertificateException 。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the given number of bytes to be copied is larger than the length of this SerialBlob object's array of bytes, the given number will be shortened to the array's length.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果要复制的给定字节数大于此 SerialBlob 对象的字节数组的长度，则给定数将缩短为该数组的长度。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the given output stream is Flushable then its flush method may need to invoked after this method completes so as to flush any buffered output.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果给定的输出流是 Flushable 的,则在此方法完成后可能需要调用其 flush 方法，以便刷新任何缓冲的输出。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the language-specific behavior for an operation on a missing member is to throw an exception then the factory should produce a method handle that throws the exception when invoked, and must not throw an exception itself, as the linkage for the missing member is often conditional.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,如果对缺失成员的操作的语言特定行为是抛出异常,那么工厂应该在调用时产生一个抛出异常的方法句柄,而且一定不能自己抛出异常,因为缺失成员的链接往往是有条件的。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the program uses hasMoreElements() and nextElement() instead to iterate through the NamingEnumeration, because these methods cannot throw exceptions, no exception will be thrown. Instead, in the previous example, after the n'th result has been returned by nextElement(), invoking hasMoreElements() would return false.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,如果程序使用hasMoreElements()和nextElement()来代替NamingEnumeration进行迭代,因为这些方法不能抛出异常,所以不会抛出异常。相反,在前面的例子中,当 nextElement()返回第n'th个结果后,调用 hasMoreElements()将返回 false。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the result is null, then the Logger will use a resource bundle or resource bundle name inherited from its parent.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果结果为 null ，则Logger将使用从其父级继承的资源束或资源束名称。

trans-unit.source: Note that if this method enters the abort phase (either the login or commit phase failed), this method invokes all LoginModules configured for the application regardless of their respective Configuration flag parameters. Essentially this means that Requisite and Sufficient semantics are ignored during the abort phase. This guarantees that proper cleanup and state restoration can take place.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果此方法进入 abort 阶段（ login 或 commit 阶段失败），则此方法将调用为应用程序配置的所有LoginModule，无论它们各自的 Configuration 标志参数如何。本质上，这意味着 abort 阶段将忽略 Requisite 和 Sufficient 语义。这保证了可以进行适当的清理和状态恢复。

trans-unit.source: Note that if this method returns EXPLICIT and the annotation mirror was created from a class file, then the element may not, in fact, correspond to an explicitly declared construct in source code. This is due to limitations of the fidelity of the class file format in preserving information from source code. For example, at least some versions of the class file format do not preserve whether an annotation was explicitly declared by the programmer or was implicitly declared as a container annotation.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果此方法返回 EXPLICIT 并且注释镜像是从类文件创建的，则该元素实际上可能与源代码中显式声明的构造相对应。这是由于在保留源代码中的信息时类文件格式的保真度的限制。例如，至少某些类文件格式的版本不保留注释是由程序员显式声明还是隐式声明为容器注释。

trans-unit.source: Note that if this method returns EXPLICIT and the element was created from a class file, then the element may not, in fact, correspond to an explicitly declared construct in source code. This is due to limitations of the fidelity of the class file format in preserving information from source code. For example, at least some versions of the class file format do not preserve whether a constructor was explicitly declared by the programmer or was implicitly declared as the default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果此方法返回 EXPLICIT 并且该元素是从类文件创建的，则该元素实际上可能不对应于源代码中显式声明的构造。这是由于在保留源代码中的信息时类文件格式的保真度的限制。例如，至少某些类文件格式的版本不保留构造函数是由程序员显式声明还是隐式声明为默认构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Note that if this method returns EXPLICIT and the module directive was created from a class file, then the module directive may not, in fact, correspond to an explicitly declared construct in source code. This is due to limitations of the fidelity of the class file format in preserving information from source code. For example, at least some versions of the class file format do not preserve whether a uses directive was explicitly declared by the programmer or was added as a synthetic construct.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果此方法返回 EXPLICIT 并且模块指令是从类文件创建的，则模块指令实际上可能不对应于源代码中显式声明的构造。这是由于在保留源代码中的信息时类文件格式的保真度的限制。例如，至少某些类文件格式的版本不保留 uses 指令是由程序员显式声明还是作为合成构造添加的。

trans-unit.source: Note that if your application creates its own custom activation group, a security manager must be set for that group. Otherwise objects cannot be activated in the group. SecurityManager is set by default.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果您的应用程序创建了自己的自定义激活组，则必须为该组设置安全管理器。否则，无法在组中激活对象。默认情况下设置 SecurityManager 。

trans-unit.source: Note that it is possible that acceptSecContext return a token for the peer, and isEstablished return true also. This indicates that the token needs to be sent to the peer, but the local end of the context is now fully established.

trans-unit.source: Note that it is possible to skip something without risking a NoSuchElementException by using a pattern that can match nothing, e.g., sc.skip("[ \t]*").
trans-unit.target: 注意，可以使用不匹配的模式跳过某些内容而不会冒 NoSuchElementException 的风险，例如 sc.skip("[ \t]*") 。

trans-unit.source: Note that it is the programmer's responsibility to ensure that each tab has a unique mnemonic or unpredictable results may occur.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,程序员有责任确保每个选项卡都有一个独特的记号,否则可能会出现不可预知的结果。

trans-unit.source: Note that it is valid for an ImageReader to call flushBefore as part of a read operation. Therefore, if an application calls mark prior to passing that stream to an ImageReader, the application should not assume that the marked position will remain valid after the read operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，作为 ImageReader 的一部分，在读取操作中调用 flushBefore 是有效的。因此，如果应用程序在将该流传 ImageReader 之前调用了 mark ，则该应用程序不应假定在读取操作完成之后标记的位置将保持有效。

trans-unit.source: Note that left rotation with a negative distance is equivalent to right rotation: rotateLeft(val, -distance) == rotateRight(val, distance). Note also that rotation by any multiple of 32 is a no-op, so all but the last five bits of the rotation distance can be ignored, even if the distance is negative: rotateLeft(val, distance) == rotateLeft(val, distance & 0x1F).
trans-unit.target: 注意，向左旋转负距离等于向右旋转： rotateLeft(val, -distance) == rotateRight(val, distance) 。还要注意，以32的任意倍数进行的旋转是空操作，因此，即使距离的最后五个位为负，也可以忽略所有旋转距离，即使该距离为负： rotateLeft(val, distance) == rotateLeft(val, distance & 0x1F) 。

trans-unit.source: Note that left rotation with a negative distance is equivalent to right rotation: rotateLeft(val, -distance) == rotateRight(val, distance). Note also that rotation by any multiple of 64 is a no-op, so all but the last six bits of the rotation distance can be ignored, even if the distance is negative: rotateLeft(val, distance) == rotateLeft(val, distance & 0x3F).
trans-unit.target: 注意，向左旋转负距离等于向右旋转： rotateLeft(val, -distance) == rotateRight(val, distance) 。还要注意，以64的任意倍数进行的旋转都是空操作，因此，即使距离的最后六位 rotateLeft(val, distance) == rotateLeft(val, distance & 0x3F) ，所有旋转距离都可以忽略，即使该距离为负：rotateLeft（val，distance）== rotateLeft（val，distance） ＆0x3F）。

trans-unit.source: Note that methods to accommodate new language constructs could be added in a source compatible way if they were added as default methods. However, default methods are only available on Java SE 8 and higher releases and the javax.lang.model.* packages bundled in Java SE 8 were required to also be runnable on Java SE 7. Therefore, default methods were not used when extending javax.lang.model.* to cover Java SE 8 language features. However, default methods are used in subsequent revisions of the javax.lang.model.* packages that are only required to run on Java SE 8 and higher platform versions.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果将适应新语言构造的方法作为默认方法添加，则可以以源兼容的方式添加。但是，默认方法仅在Java SE 8和更高版本上可用，并且Java SE 8中捆绑的 javax.lang.model.* 包也必须在Java SE 7上可运行。因此，扩展 javax.lang.model.* 时不使用默认方法。.lang.model。*涵盖Java SE 8语言功能。但是，仅在Java SE 8和更高平台版本上运行时才需要 javax.lang.model.* 程序包的后续版本中使用缺省方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that methods to accommodate new language constructs could be added in a source compatible way if they were added as default methods. However, default methods are only available on Java SE 8 and higher releases and the javax.lang.model.* packages bundled in Java SE 8 are required to also be runnable on Java SE 7. Therefore, default methods cannot be used when extending javax.lang.model.* to cover Java SE 8 language features. However, default methods may be used in subsequent revisions of the javax.lang.model.* packages that are only required to run on Java SE 8 and higher platform versions.

trans-unit.source: Note that packing and unpacking a JAR will in general alter the bytewise contents of classfiles in the JAR. This means that packing and unpacking will in general invalidate any digital signatures which rely on bytewise images of JAR elements. In order both to sign and to pack a JAR, you must first pack and unpack the JAR to "normalize" it, then compute signatures on the unpacked JAR elements, and finally repack the signed JAR. Both packing steps should use precisely the same options, and the segment limit may also need to be set to "-1", to prevent accidental variation of segment boundaries as class file sizes change slightly.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,打包和解压JAR一般会改变JAR中classfile的字节内容。这意味着打包和解压一般会使任何依赖于JAR元素字节图像的数字签名无效。为了对一个JAR进行签名和打包,你必须首先对JAR进行打包和解压,使其 "正常化",然后对解压后的JAR元素进行计算签名,最后对签名后的JAR进行重新打包。这两个打包步骤应该使用完全相同的选项,段限制可能还需要设置为"-1",以防止在类文件大小稍有变化时,段边界意外变化。

trans-unit.source: Note that painting a pixel with the alpha value of 0 may or may not disable the mouse event handling on this pixel. This is a platform-dependent behavior. To make sure the mouse events do not get dispatched to a particular pixel, the pixel must be excluded from the shape of the window.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，绘制alpha值为 0 的像素可能会或可能不会禁用对此像素的鼠标事件处理。这是平台相关的行为。为了确保不会将鼠标事件调度到特定像素，必须从窗口形状中排除该像素。

trans-unit.source: Note that right rotation with a negative distance is equivalent to left rotation: rotateRight(val, -distance) == rotateLeft(val, distance). Note also that rotation by any multiple of 32 is a no-op, so all but the last five bits of the rotation distance can be ignored, even if the distance is negative: rotateRight(val, distance) == rotateRight(val, distance & 0x1F).
trans-unit.target: 请注意，负距离的右旋等效于左旋： rotateRight(val, -distance) == rotateLeft(val, distance) 。还要注意，以32的任意倍数进行旋转都是空操作，因此，即使距离的最后五个位为负数，也可以忽略所有旋转距离，即使该距离为负： rotateRight(val, distance) == rotateRight(val, distance & 0x1F) 。

trans-unit.source: Note that since untrusted code may create loggers with arbitrary names this method should not be relied on to find Loggers for security sensitive logging. It is also important to note that the Logger associated with the String name may be garbage collected at any time if there is no strong reference to the Logger. The caller of this method must check the return value for null in order to properly handle the case where the Logger has been garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，由于不受信任的代码可能会创建具有任意名称的记录器，因此不应依赖此方法来查找用于安全敏感日志记录的记录器。同样重要的是要注意，如果没有对Logger的强引用，则随时可能会垃圾收集与String name 关联的Logger。此方法的调用者必须检查返回值是否为null，以便正确处理Logger已被垃圾回收的情况。

trans-unit.source: Note that some image formats (such as animated GIF) do not specify how many images are present in the stream. Thus determining the number of images will require the entire stream to be scanned and may require memory for buffering. If images are to be processed in order, it may be more efficient to simply call read with increasing indices until an IndexOutOfBoundsException is thrown to indicate that no more images are available. The allowSearch parameter may be set to false to indicate that an exhaustive search is not desired; the return value will be -1 to indicate that a search is necessary. If the input has been specified with seekForwardOnly set to true, this method throws an IllegalStateException if allowSearch is set to true.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，某些图像格式（例如动画GIF）没有指定流中存在多少图像。因此，确定图像的数量将需要扫描整个流，并且可能需要用于缓冲的存储器。如果要按顺序处理图像，则简单地使用增加索引的方式调用 read ，直到抛出 IndexOutOfBoundsException 以指示没有更多图像可用，这样可能会更有效率。可以将 allowSearch 参数设置为 false ,以指示不希望进行详尽搜索。返回值将为 -1 ，表示必须进行搜索。如果已将 seekForwardOnly 设置为 true 来指定输入，如果 allowSearch 设置为 true ，则此方法将抛出 IllegalStateException 。

trans-unit.source: Note that some implementations may function more efficiently if they can maintain control over how the data for an image is stored. For example, optimizations such as caching an image in video memory require that the implementation track all modifications to that data. Other implementations may operate better if they can store the data in locations other than a Java array. To maintain optimum compatibility with various optimizations it is best to avoid constructors and methods which expose the underlying storage as a Java array as noted below in the documentation for those methods.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,如果一些实现能够保持对图像数据存储方式的控制,它们可能会更有效地发挥作用。例如,诸如在视频存储器中缓存图像这样的优化要求实现跟踪对该数据的所有修改。如果其他实现能够将数据存储在Java数组以外的其他位置,那么它们的运行效果可能会更好。为了保持与各种优化的最佳兼容性,最好避免使用将底层存储暴露为Java数组的构造函数和方法,如下文所述,这些方法的文档中。

trans-unit.source: Note that some platforms require special privileges or extensions to access low-level input control. If the current platform configuration does not allow input control, an AWTException will be thrown when trying to construct Robot objects. For example, X-Window systems will throw the exception if the XTEST 2.2 standard extension is not supported (or not enabled) by the X server.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，某些平台需要特殊的特权或扩展才能访问低级输入控件。如果当前平台配置不允许输入控制，则在尝试构造Robot对象时将引发 AWTException 。例如，如果X服务器不支持（或未启用）XTEST 2.2标准扩展，则X-Window系统将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Note that some recent W3C specifications require that text in some encodings be normalized, using Unicode Normalization Form C, before processing. Such normalization must be performed by applications, and would normally be triggered based on the value returned by this method.

trans-unit.source: Note that sometimes this AffineTransform is identity, such as for printers or metafile output, and that this AffineTransform is only as accurate as the information supplied by the underlying system. trans-unit.target: 请注意，有时此 AffineTransform 是标识，例如用于打印机或图元文件输出，并且此 AffineTransform 仅与基础系统提供的信息一样准确。对于与设备不相关的图像缓冲区，例如由 createCompatibleImage 创建的图像缓冲区，由于没有有效的距离度量，因此此 AffineTransform 是Identity变换。

trans-unit.source: Note that start/endPrefixMapping events are not guaranteed to be properly nested relative to each other: all startPrefixMapping events will occur immediately before the corresponding startElement event, and all endPrefixMapping events will occur immediately after the corresponding endElement event, but their order is not otherwise guaranteed.

trans-unit.source: Note that the CertStore.getInstance methods make a copy of the specified CertStoreParameters. A deep copy implementation of clone is safer and more robust, as it prevents the caller from corrupting a shared CertStore by subsequently modifying the contents of its initialization parameters. However, a shallow copy implementation of clone is more appropriate for applications that need to hold a reference to a parameter contained in the CertStoreParameters. For example, a shallow copy clone allows an application to release the resources of a particular CertStore initialization parameter immediately, rather than waiting for the garbage collection mechanism. This should be done with the utmost care, since the CertStore may still be in use by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， CertStore.getInstance 方法复制指定的 CertStoreParameters 。 clone 深层复制实现更加安全可靠，因为它可以防止调用方通过随后修改其初始化参数的内容来破坏共享的 CertStore 。但是，对于需要保留对 CertStoreParameters 中包含的参数的引用的应用程序， clone 的浅表复制实现更适合。例如，浅表副本克隆允许应用程序释放特定 CertStore 的资源。立即初始化参数，而不是等待垃圾回收机制。应当格外小心，因为 CertStore 可能仍被其他线程使用。

trans-unit.target: 请注意，返回的 Collection 可能包含多个相同类型的名称。另外，请注意，返回的 Collection 是不可变的，并且将克隆任何包含字节数组的条目以防止后续修改。

trans-unit.source: Note that the DragSourceContext itself implements the DragSourceListener and DragSourceMotionListener interfaces. This is to allow the platform peer (the DragSourceContextPeer instance) created by the DragSource to notify the DragSourceContext of state changes in the ongoing operation. This allows the DragSourceContext object to interpose itself between the platform and the listeners provided by the initiator of the drag operation.

trans-unit.source: Note that the wait method, as it places the current thread into the wait set for this object, unlocks only this object; any other objects on which the current thread may be synchronized remain locked while the thread waits.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， wait 方法将当前线程放入此对象的等待集中，因此只会解锁该对象；当线程等待时，当前线程可以在其上同步的所有其他对象保持锁定。

trans-unit.source: Note that the AccessibleRole class is also extensible, so custom component developers can define their own AccessibleRole's if the set of predefined roles is inadequate.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,AccessibleRole类也是可扩展的,所以如果预定义的角色集不够用,自定义组件开发者可以定义自己的AccessibleRole。

trans-unit.source: Note that the AdjustmentEvents type property will always have a placeholder value of AdjustmentEvent.TRACK because all changes to a BoundedRangeModels value are considered equivalent. To change the value of a BoundedRangeModel one just sets its value property, i.e. model.setValue(123). No information about the origin of the change, e.g. it's a block decrement, is provided. We don't try fabricate the origin of the change here.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,AdjustmentEvents类型属性的占位值将始终为AdjustmentEvent.TRACK,因为对BoundedRangeModels值的所有更改都被认为是等价的。要改变一个BoundedRangeModel的值,只需设置它的value属性,即model.setValue(123)。没有提供关于改变的起源的信息,例如这是一个块的减法。我们在这里不尝试捏造变化的起源。

trans-unit.source: Note that the AdjustmentEvents type property will always have a placeholder value of AdjustmentEvent.TRACK because all changes to a BoundedRangeModels value are considered equivalent. To change the value of a BoundedRangeModel one just sets its value property, i.e. model.setValue(123). No information about the origin of the change, e.g. it's a block decrement, is provided. We don't try to fabricate the origin of the change here.

trans-unit.target: 注意，Handler类必须是抽象类 URLStreamHandler 的子类。

trans-unit.source: Note that the ISO-8601 standard does not actually define eras. Note also that the ISO eras do not align with the well-known AD/BC eras due to the change between the Julian and Gregorian calendar systems.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,ISO-8601标准实际上并没有定义年代。还请注意,由于朱利安历和格里高利历系统之间的变化,ISO年代与众所周知的公元/公元前年代不一致。

trans-unit.source: Note that the InputSource gets no further resolution. Implementations of this method may wish to invoke resolveEntity() to gain benefits such as use of local caches of DTD entities. Also, this method will never be used by a (non-validating) processor that is not including external parameter entities.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，InputSource无法获得进一步的解析。此方法的实现可能希望调用 resolveEntity() 以获得诸如使用DTD实体的本地缓存之类的好处。同样，不包含外部参数实体的（非验证）处理器将永远不会使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that the JDBC RowSet Implementations include the SyncProvider implementations RIOptimisticProvider and RIXmlProvider, which satisfy this requirement.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，JDBC RowSet实现包括满足此要求的 SyncProvider 实现 RIOptimisticProvider 和 RIXmlProvider 。

trans-unit.source: Note that the JDK Implementation uses default values for both the session cache size and timeout. See getSessionCacheSize and getSessionTimeout for more information. Applications should consider their performance requirements and override the defaults if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，JDK实现对会话缓存大小和超时使用默认值。有关更多信息，请参见 getSessionCacheSize 和 getSessionTimeout 。应用程序应考虑其性能要求，并在必要时覆盖默认值。

trans-unit.source: Note that the KeyboardFocusManager itself implements KeyEventPostProcessor. By default, the current KeyboardFocusManager will be the final KeyEventPostProcessor in the chain. The current KeyboardFocusManager cannot be completely deregistered as a KeyEventPostProcessor. However, if a KeyEventPostProcessor reports that no further post-processing of the KeyEvent should take place, the AWT will consider the event fully handled and will take no additional action with regard to the event. (While it is possible for client code to register the current KeyboardFocusManager as a KeyEventPostProcessor one or more times, this is usually unnecessary and not recommended.)
trans-unit.target: 请注意,KeyboardFocusManager本身实现了KeyEventPostProcessor。默认情况下,当前的 KeyboardFocusManager 将是链中的最后一个 KeyEventPostProcessor。当前的KeyboardFocusManager不能完全取消注册为KeyEventPostProcessor。然而,如果一个KeyEventPostProcessor报告说不应该对KeyEvent进行进一步的后处理,AWT将认为该事件已被完全处理,并且不会对该事件采取额外的行动。虽然客户端代码可以将当前的KeyboardFocusManager注册为一个或多个KeyEventPostProcessor,但这通常是不必要的,也不建议这样做)。

trans-unit.source: Note that the PKIX certification path validation algorithm specifies that any policy qualifier in a certificate policies extension that is marked critical must be processed and validated. Otherwise the certification path must be rejected. If the policyQualifiersRejected flag is set to false, it is up to the application to validate all policy qualifiers in this manner in order to be PKIX compliant.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，PKIX认证路径验证算法指定必须处理和验证证书策略扩展中标记为关键的任何策略限定符。否则，必须拒绝认证路径。如果 policyQualifiersRejected 标志设置为false，则由应用程序以这种方式验证所有策略限定符，以使其与PKIX兼容。

trans-unit.source: Note that the PKIX certification path validation algorithm specifies that any policy qualifier in a certificate policies extension that is marked critical must be processed and validated. Otherwise the certification path must be rejected. If the policyQualifiersRejected flag is set to false, it is up to the application to validate all policy qualifiers in this manner in order to be PKIX compliant.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,PKIX认证路径验证算法规定,证书策略扩展中任何标记为关键的策略限定符都必须被处理和验证。否则认证路径必须被拒绝。如果policyQualifiersRejected标志被设置为false,则应用程序要以这种方式验证所有策略限定符,以符合PKIX标准。

trans-unit.source: Note that the activator receives a "marshalled" object instead of a Remote object so that the activator does not need to load the code for that object, or participate in distributed garbage collection for that object. If the activator kept a strong reference to the remote object, the activator would then prevent the object from being garbage collected under the normal distributed garbage collection mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,激活器收到的是一个 "marshalled "对象,而不是一个Remote对象,这样激活器就不需要为该对象加载代码,也不需要参与该对象的分布式垃圾收集。如果激活器保留了对远程对象的强引用,那么激活器将防止该对象在正常的分布式垃圾收集机制下被垃圾收集。

trans-unit.source: Note that the actual maximum value of the scroll bar is the maximum minus the visible amount. In the previous example, because the maximum is 300 and the visible amount is 60, the actual maximum value is 240. The range of the scrollbar track is 0 - 300. The left side of the bubble indicates the value of the scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，滚动条的实际最大值是 maximum 减去 visible amount 。在前面的示例中，因为 maximum 为300， visible amount 为60，所以实际最大值为240。滚动条轨道的范围是0-300 。气泡的左侧表示滚动条的值。

trans-unit.source: Note that the advance of a String is not necessarily the sum of the advances of its characters measured in isolation because the width of a character can vary depending on its context. For example, in Arabic text, the shape of a character can change in order to connect to other characters. Also, in some scripts, certain character sequences can be represented by a single shape, called a ligature. Measuring characters individually does not account for these transformations.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， String 不一定是单独测量的字符的行距的总和，因为字符串的宽度可以根据其上下文而变化。例如，在阿拉伯文本中，字符的形状可以更改以连接到其他字符。同样，在某些脚本中，某些字符序列可以用称为连字的单个形状表示。单独测量字符并不能说明这些转换。

trans-unit.source: Note that the behavior of this method differs from the older Calendar.getInstance(Locale) method. If that method receives a locale of "th_TH" it will return BuddhistCalendar. By contrast, this method will return IsoChronology. Passing the locale "th-TH-u-ca-buddhist" into either method will result in the Thai Buddhist calendar system and is therefore the recommended approach going forward for Thai calendar system localization.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此方法的行为不同于旧的 Calendar.getInstance(Locale) 方法。如果该方法接收的区域“th_TH”它将返回 BuddhistCalendar 。相比之下，此方法将返回 IsoChronology 。将语言环境“ th-TH-u-ca-buddhist”传递给任一方法都将导致泰国佛教历法系统，因此是泰国历法系统本地化的推荐方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that the compiler can generate try-catch blocks in some cases where they are not explicit in the source code; for example, the code generated for synchronized and finally blocks can contain implicit try-catch blocks. If such an implicitly generated try-catch is present on the call stack at the time of the throw, the exception will be considered caught even though it appears to be uncaught from examination of the source code.
trans-unit.target: 注意，在某些情况下，编译器可以生成try-catch块，而在源代码中却没有明确的说明。例如，为 synchronized 块和 finally 块生成的代码可以包含隐式try-catch块。如果在抛出时在调用堆栈上存在这种隐式生成的try-catch，则即使看起来似乎没有检查源代码，也会将异常视为已捕获。

trans-unit.source: Note that the fail-fast behavior of an iterator cannot be guaranteed as it is, generally speaking, impossible to make any hard guarantees in the presence of unsynchronized concurrent modification. Fail-fast iterators throw ConcurrentModificationException on a best-effort basis. Therefore, it would be wrong to write a program that depended on this exception for its correctness:
trans-unit.target: 注意，不能保证迭代器的快速失败行为，因为通常来说，在存在不同步的并发修改的情况下，不可能做出任何严格的保证。快速失败的迭代器会尽最大努力抛出 ConcurrentModificationException 。因此，编写依赖于此异常的程序的正确性是错误的：

trans-unit.source: Note that the fail-fast behavior of an iterator cannot be guaranteed as it is, generally speaking, impossible to make any hard guarantees in the presence of unsynchronized concurrent modification. Fail-fast iterators throw ConcurrentModificationException on a best-effort basis. Therefore, it would be wrong to write a program that depended on this exception for its correctness: the fail-fast behavior of iterators should be used only to detect bugs.
trans-unit.target: 注意，不能保证迭代器的快速失败行为，因为通常来说，在存在不同步的并发修改的情况下，不可能做出任何严格的保证。快速失败的迭代器会尽最大努力抛出 ConcurrentModificationException 。因此，编写依赖于此异常的程序的正确性是错误的：迭代器的快速失败行为应仅用于检测错误。

trans-unit.source: Note that the guarantees of the compareAndSet method in this class are weaker than in other atomic classes. Because this class cannot ensure that all uses of the field are appropriate for purposes of atomic access, it can guarantee atomicity only with respect to other invocations of compareAndSet and set on the same updater.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此类中的 compareAndSet 方法的保证要弱于其他原子类。因为此类无法确保该字段的所有使用都适合于原子访问，所以它只能保证对同一个updater上的 compareAndSet 和 set 的其他调用具有原子性。

trans-unit.source: Note that the intermediate values, which are always in premultiplied form, would only allow the integer red component to be either 0x00 or 0x01. When we try to store this result back into a destination that is not premultiplied, dividing out the alpha will give us very few choices for the non-premultiplied red value. In this case an implementation that performs the math in integer space without shortcuts is likely to end up with the final pixel values of:
trans-unit.target: 请注意,中间值总是以预乘形式存在,只会允许整数红色分量是0x00或0x01。当我们试图将这个结果存储回一个非预乘的目标中时,除掉alpha将使我们对非预乘的红色值的选择非常少。在这种情况下,一个在整数空间中进行数学运算而不使用快捷键的实现很可能最终得到的最终像素值为:。

trans-unit.source: Note that the lack of an AuthenticationException does not mean that the failure was not due to an authentication error. trans-unit.source: Note that the media white point tag in an ICC profile is not the same as the device white point. The media white point tag is expressed in PCS values and is used to represent the difference between the XYZ of device illuminant and the XYZ of the device media when measured under that illuminant. The device white point is expressed as the device XYZ values corresponding to white displayed on the device. For example, displaying the RGB color (1.0, 1.0, 1.0) on an sRGB device will result in a measured device XYZ value of D65. This will not be the same as the media white point tag XYZ value in the ICC profile for an sRGB device.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,ICC配置文件中的介质白点标签与设备白点不同。介质白点标签以PCS值表示,用于表示在该光源下测量时,设备照明的XYZ和设备介质的XYZ之间的差异。设备白点表示为设备上显示的白色所对应的设备XYZ值。例如,在sRGB设备上显示RGB颜色(1.0,1.0,1.0)将导致测量的设备XYZ值为D65。这将与sRGB设备的ICC配置文件中的介质白点标签XYZ值不同。

trans-unit.source: Note that the number returned is a snapshot of how much memory is available; some images may still have problems being allocated into that memory. For example, depending on operating system, driver, memory configuration, and thread situations, the full extent of the size reported may not be available for a given image. There are further inquiry methods on the ImageCapabilities object associated with a VolatileImage that can be used to determine whether a particular VolatileImage has been created in accelerated memory.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，返回的数字是可用内存量的快照。有些图像可能仍然有问题，无法分配到该内存中。例如，根据操作系统，驱动程序，内存配置和线程情况的不同，所报告大小的全部范围可能不适用于给定映像。与 ImageCapabilities 关联的ImageCapabilities对象还有其他查询方法，可用于确定是否已在加速内存中创建了特定的VolatileImage。

trans-unit.source: Note that the ordering maintained by a set (whether or not an explicit comparator is provided) must be
trans-unit.target: 请注意,一个集合所保持的排序(无论是否提供了显式比较器)必须是

trans-unit.source: Note that the ordering maintained by a sorted map (whether or not an explicit comparator is provided) must be consistent with equals if the sorted map is to correctly implement the Map interface. (See the Comparable interface or Comparator interface for a precise definition of consistent with equals.) This is so because the Map interface is defined in terms of the equals operation, but a sorted map performs all key comparisons using its compareTo (or compare) method, so two keys that are deemed equal by this method are, from the standpoint of the sorted map, equal. The behavior of a tree map is well-defined even if its ordering is inconsistent with equals; it just fails to obey the general contract of the Map interface.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果排序后的映射要正确实现 Map 接口，则排序后的映射（无论是否提供显式比较器）所维护的顺序必须与equals一致。 （有关与equals一致的精确定义，请参见 Comparable 接口或 Comparator 接口。）之所以这样，是因为 Map 接口是根据 equals 操作定义的，但是排序后的map使用其 compareTo （或 compare ）方法执行所有键比较。，因此从排序后的映射的角度来看，此方法认为相等的两个键是相等的。树形图的行为是明确的，即使它的排序和equals不一致; 它只是不遵守 Map 接口的一般约定。

trans-unit.source: Note that the ordering maintained by a sorted set (whether or not an explicit comparator is provided) must be
trans-unit.target: 请注意,排序集所保持的排序(无论是否提供了显式比较器)必须是

trans-unit.source: Note that the ordering maintained by a tree map, like any sorted map, and whether or not an explicit comparator is provided, must be consistent with equals if this sorted map is to correctly implement the Map interface. (See Comparable or Comparator for a precise definition of consistent with equals.) This is so because the Map interface is defined in terms of the equals operation, but a sorted map performs all key comparisons using its compareTo (or compare) method, so two keys that are deemed equal by this method are, from the standpoint of the sorted map, equal. The behavior of a sorted map is well-defined even if its ordering is inconsistent with equals; it just fails to obey the general contract of the Map interface.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果树排序图要正确实现 Map 接口，则树映射所维护的排序（与任何排序的映射一样）以及是否提供显式比较器必须与 equals 一致。（有关与equals一致的精确定义，请参见 Comparable 或 Comparator 。）之所以这样，是因为 Map 接口是根据 equals 操作定义的，但是排序后的map会使用其 compareTo （或 compare )来执行所有键比较）方法，因此从排序映射的角度来看，此方法认为相等的两个键是相等的。即使排序的映射顺序与 equals 不一致，也可以很好地定义其行为。它只是不遵守 Map 接口的一般约定。

trans-unit.source: Note that the ordering maintained by a tree map, like any sorted map, and whether or not an explicit comparator is provided, must be consistent with equals if this sorted map is to correctly implement the Map interface. (See Comparable or Comparator for a precise definition of consistent with equals.) This is so because the Map interface is defined in terms of the equals operation, but a sorted map performs all key comparisons using its compareTo (or compare) method, so two keys that are deemed equal by this method are, from the standpoint of the sorted map, equal. The behavior of a sorted map is well-defined even if its ordering is inconsistent with equals; it just fails to obey the general contract of the Map interface.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果树排序图要正确实现 Map 接口，则树映射所维护的排序（与任何排序的映射一样）以及是否提供显式比较器必须与 equals 一致。（有关与equals一致的精确定义，请参见 Comparable 或 Comparator 。）之所以这样，是因为 Map 接口是根据 equals 操作定义的，但是排序后的map会使用其 compareTo （或 compare )来执行所有键比较）方法，因此从排序映射的角度来看，此方法认为相等的两个键是相等的。有序映射的行为是明确的，即使它的排序和不一致的 equals ;它只是不遵守 Map 接口的一般约定。

trans-unit.source: Note that the other constructors of Throwable treat suppression as being enabled and the stack trace as being writable. Subclasses of Throwable should document any conditions under which suppression is disabled and document conditions under which the stack trace is not writable. Disabling of suppression should only occur in exceptional circumstances where special requirements exist, such as a virtual machine reusing exception objects under low-memory situations. Circumstances where a given exception object is repeatedly caught and rethrown, such as to implement control flow between two sub-systems, is another situation where immutable throwable objects would be appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， Throwable 的其他构造函数将抑制视为已启用，并将堆栈跟踪视为可写。 Throwable 的子类应记录禁用禁用的任何条件，以及记录堆栈跟踪不可写的条件。仅在存在特殊要求的例外情况下（例如，虚拟机在低内存情况下重用异常对象），才可以禁用抑制。反复捕获和重新抛出给定异常对象（例如在两个子系统之间实现控制流）的情况是不可变的可抛出对象将是适当的另一种情况。

trans-unit.source: Note that the parameter type lists (V...) and (A...) have been expanded to their full length, even though individual clause functions may neglect to take them all. As noted above, missing parameters are filled in as if by dropArgumentsToMatch(MethodHandle, int, List, int).
trans-unit.target: 请注意，参数类型列表 (V...) 和 (A...) 已扩展为完整长度，即使单个子句函数可能忽略了全部内容。如上所述，缺少的参数就像 dropArgumentsToMatch(MethodHandle, int, List, int) 一样被填充。

trans-unit.target: 请注意，传递的 <var>delegate</var> 可能不直接是此实现返回的MBeanServerDelegate。例如，它可以是包装先前返回的委托的新对象。

trans-unit.source: Note that the passed <var>delegate</var> might not be directly the MBeanServerDelegate that was returned by this method. It could be, for instance, a new object wrapping the previously returned object.

trans-unit.source: Note that the pattern string is similar, but not identical, to SimpleDateFormat. The pattern string is also similar, but not identical, to that defined by the Unicode Common Locale Data Repository (CLDR/LDML). Pattern letters 'X' and 'u' are aligned with Unicode CLDR/LDML. By contrast, SimpleDateFormat uses 'u' for the numeric day of week. Pattern letters 'y' and 'Y' parse years of two digits and more than 4 digits differently. Pattern letters 'n', 'A', 'N', and 'p' are added. Number types will reject large numbers.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，模式字符串与 SimpleDateFormat 相似但不相同。模式字符串也与Unicode通用语言环境数据存储库（CLDR / LDML）定义的模式字符串相似但不相同。模式字母“ X”和“ u”与Unicode CLDR / LDML对齐。相比之下， SimpleDateFormat 使用“ u”表示星期几。模式字母“ y”和“ Y”分别解析两位数字和超过4位数字的年份。添加了模式字母“ n”，“ A”，“ N”和“ p”。数字类型将拒绝大数字。

trans-unit.source: Note that the result only describes the minimum and maximum valid values and it is important not to read too much into them. For example, there could be values within the range that are invalid for the field.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,结果只描述了最小和最大的有效值,重要的是不要对其理解太多。例如,在这个范围内,可能有一些值对该字段来说是无效的。

trans-unit.source: Note that the results returned by the object will be valid only during the scope of each callback method: the application will receive unpredictable results if it attempts to use the locator at any other time, or after parsing completes.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,对象返回的结果仅在每个回调方法的范围内有效:如果应用程序在任何其他时间尝试使用定位器,或者在解析完成后,它将收到不可预测的结果。

trans-unit.source: Note that the reverse operation may result in producing surrogate pairs that were unpaired low-surrogates and high-surrogates before the operation. For example, reversing "\uDC00\uD800" produces "\uD800\uDC00" which is a valid surrogate pair.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,反向操作可能会导致产生在操作前未配对的低代词和高代词的代词对。例如,逆向操作"\uDC00\uD800 "会产生"\uD800\uDC00",这是一个有效的代用对。

trans-unit.source: Note that there is an asymmetry in this library: getPrefix will not return the "" prefix, even if you have declared a default element namespace. To check for a default namespace, you have to look it up explicitly using getURI. This asymmetry exists to make it easier to look up prefixes for attribute names, where the default prefix is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此库中存在不对称性：即使您已声明默认的元素名称空间， getPrefix 也不会返回“”前缀。要检查默认的名称空间，必须使用 getURI 显式地查找它。存在这种不对称性使得可以更轻松地查找属性名称的前缀，其中不允许使用默认前缀。

trans-unit.source: Note that there is no read method that takes a filename as a String; use this method instead after creating a File from the filename.
trans-unit.target: 注意，没有将文件名作为 String 的 read 方法；根据文件名创建 File 后，请使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that there may be more than one matching method in a class because while the Java language forbids a class to declare multiple methods with the same signature but different return types, the Java virtual machine does not. This increased flexibility in the virtual machine can be used to implement various language features. For example, covariant returns can be implemented with bridge methods; the bridge method and the method being overridden would have the same signature but different return types.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，一个类中可能有多个匹配方法，因为Java语言禁止一个类声明具有相同签名但返回类型不同的多个方法，而Java虚拟机却没有。虚拟机中这种增加的灵活性可用于实现各种语言功能。例如，协变收益可以通过桥接方法实现；bridge方法和被重写的方法将具有相同的签名，但返回类型不同。

trans-unit.source: Note that these conditions apply to both OCSP and CRLs, and unless the NO_FALLBACK option is set, the revocation check is allowed to succeed only if both mechanisms fail under one of the conditions as stated above. Exceptions that cause the network errors are ignored but can be later retrieved by calling the getSoftFailExceptions method.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，这些条件适用于OCSP和CRL，并且除非设置了 NO_FALLBACK 选项，否则仅当两种机制都在上述一种条件下失败时，才允许吊销检查成功。导致网络错误的异常将被忽略，但以后可以通过调用 getSoftFailExceptions 方法进行检索。

trans-unit.source: Note that these conditions apply to both OCSP and CRLs, and unless the NO_FALLBACK option is set, the revocation check is allowed to succeed only if both mechanisms fail under one of the conditions as stated above. Exceptions that cause the network errors are ignored but can be later retrieved by calling the getSoftFailExceptions method.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，这些条件适用于OCSP和CRL，并且除非设置了 NO_FALLBACK 选项，否则仅当两种机制都在上述一种条件下失败时，才允许吊销检查成功。导致网络错误的异常将被忽略，但以后可以通过调用 getSoftFailExceptions 方法进行检索。

trans-unit.source: Note that this class is abstract and extends from KeyPairGeneratorSpi for historical reasons. Application developers should only take notice of the methods defined in this KeyPairGenerator class; all the methods in the superclass are intended for cryptographic service providers who wish to supply their own implementations of key pair generators.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此类是抽象类，出于历史原因从 KeyPairGeneratorSpi 扩展。应用程序开发人员应仅注意此 KeyPairGenerator 类中定义的方法；超类中的所有方法均适用于希望提供自己的密钥对生成器实现的密码服务提供商。

trans-unit.source: Note that this class is abstract and extends from MessageDigestSpi for historical reasons. Application developers should only take notice of the methods defined in this MessageDigest class; all the methods in the superclass are intended for cryptographic service providers who wish to supply their own implementations of message digest algorithms.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此类是抽象的，出于历史原因，它是从 MessageDigestSpi 扩展的。应用程序开发人员应仅注意此 MessageDigest 类中定义的方法；超类中的所有方法均适用于希望提供自己的消息摘要算法实现的密码服务提供商。

trans-unit.source: Note that this class is applicable to both ticket granting tickets and other regular service tickets. A ticket granting ticket is just a special case of a more generalized service ticket.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,这类票据既适用于赠票,也适用于其他常规服务票据。赠票只是一种更通用的服务票的特殊情况。

trans-unit.source: Note that this class is named XMLObject rather than Object to avoid naming clashes with the existing java.lang.Object class.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，该类的名称是 XMLObject 而不是 Object ,以避免与现有的 java.lang.Object 类命名冲突。

trans-unit.source: Note that this class is named XMLSignature rather than Signature to avoid naming clashes with the existing java.security.Signature class.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，该类的名称是 XMLSignature 而不是 Signature ,以避免与现有的 java.security.Signature 类命名冲突。

trans-unit.source: Note that this class is optimized for the use case where most elements do not contain Namespace declarations: if the same prefix/URI mapping is repeated for each context (for example), this class will be somewhat less efficient.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,这个类是针对大多数元素不包含Namespace声明的使用情况进行优化的:如果每个上下文重复使用相同的前缀/URI映射(例如),这个类的效率会有所降低。

trans-unit.source: Note that this class reuses several classes from the SAX API. This does not require that the implementor of the underlying DOM implementation use a SAX parser to parse XML document into a Document. It merely requires that the implementation communicate with the application using these existing APIs.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，该类重用了SAX API中的几个类。这不需要底层DOM实现的实现者使用SAX解析器将XML文档解析为 Document 。它仅要求实现使用这些现有的API与应用程序进行通信。

trans-unit.source: Note that this class subclasses from the Image class, which includes methods that take an ImageObserver parameter for asynchronous notifications as information is received from a potential ImageProducer. Since this VolatileImage is not loaded from an asynchronous source, the various methods that take an ImageObserver parameter will behave as if the data has already been obtained from the ImageProducer. Specifically, this means that the return values from such methods will never indicate that the information is not yet available and the ImageObserver used in such methods will never need to be recorded for an asynchronous callback notification.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此类是 Image 类的子类，该类包含采用 ImageObserver 参数进行异步通知的方法，因为这些信息是从可能的 ImageProducer 接收到的。由于此 VolatileImage 并非从异步源加载，因此采用 ImageObserver 参数的各种方法的行为就好像已从 ImageProducer 中获取了数据一样。具体来说，这意味着从此类方法返回的值将永远不会指示该信息尚不可用，并且在此类方法中使用的 ImageObserver 将不再需要为异步回调通知而记录。

trans-unit.source: Note that this constructor is "protected" to allow subclassing. In general clients of logging should use one of the constant Level objects such as SEVERE or FINEST. However, if clients need to add new logging levels, they may subclass Level and define new constants.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,这个构造函数是 "保护 "的,以允许子类化。一般来说,日志记录的客户端应该使用常量Level对象之一,如SEVERE或FINEST。但是,如果客户需要添加新的日志级别,他们可以对Level进行子类化并定义新的常量。

trans-unit.source: Note that this constructor only stores references to the public and private key components in the generated key pair. This is safe, because Key objects are immutable.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此构造函数仅在生成的密钥对中存储对公共和私有密钥组件的引用。这是安全的，因为 Key 对象是不可变的。

trans-unit.source: Note that this definition permits null elements at any depth.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此定义允许在任何深度使用 null 元素。

trans-unit.source: Note that this event gives no information about the creation of the thread object which may have happened much earlier, depending on the VM being debugged.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,该事件没有提供关于创建线程对象的信息,而线程对象的创建可能发生得更早,这取决于正在调试的虚拟机。

trans-unit.source: Note that this method does not return obsolete 2-letter country codes. ISO3166-3 codes which designate country codes for those obsolete codes, can be retrieved from getISOCountries(Locale.IsoCountryCode type) with typeLocale.IsoCountryCode.PART3.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此方法不会返回过时的2个字母的国家/地区代码。这对于那些过时的代码候国家代码，可以从检索ISO3166-3码 getISOCountries(Locale.IsoCountryCode type) 与 type Locale.IsoCountryCode.PART3 。

trans-unit.source: Note that this method does not return the manifest's main attributes; see getMainAttributes().
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此方法不返回清单的主要属性。请参见 getMainAttributes() 。

trans-unit.source: Note that this method does not take any precautions to avoid problems caused by storing results into Point2D objects that will be used as the source for calculations further down the source array. This method does guarantee that if a specified Point2D object is both the source and destination for the same single point transform operation then the results will not be stored until the calculations are complete to avoid storing the results on top of the operands. If, however, the destination Point2D object for one operation is the same object as the source Point2D object for another operation further down the source array then the original coordinates in that point are overwritten before they can be converted.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此方法没有采取任何预防措施来避免由于将结果存储到 Point2D 对象中而导致的问题，这些对象将用作源数组之后的计算源。此方法可以确保，如果指定的 Point2D 对象同时是同一单点转换操作的源和目标，则在计算完成之前要避免存储结果，以避免将结果存储在操作数的顶部。但是，如果一个操作的目标 Point2D 对象与源数组下方的另一个操作的源 Point2D 对象相同，则在转换该点之前，该点的原始坐标将被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Note that this method does not wait if there are no events pending.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,如果没有事件待处理,本方法不会等待。

trans-unit.source: Note that this method invokes all LoginModules configured for the application regardless of their respective Configuration flag parameters. Essentially this means that Requisite and Sufficient semantics are ignored for this method. This guarantees that proper cleanup and state restoration can take place.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此方法将调用为应用程序配置的所有LoginModule，无论它们各自的 Configuration 标志参数如何。本质上，这意味着此方法将忽略 Requisite 和 Sufficient 语义。这保证了可以进行适当的清理和状态恢复。

trans-unit.source: Note that this method is intended for simple cases where it is convenient to read all bytes into a byte array. It is not intended for reading in large files.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,这个方法是为了在简单的情况下方便地将所有字节读入一个字节数组。它不用于读取大文件。

trans-unit.source: Note that this method is intended for simple cases where it is convenient to read all bytes into a byte array. It is not intended for reading input streams with large amounts of data.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,这个方法是为了在简单的情况下方便地将所有字节读入一个字节数组。它不用于读取有大量数据的输入流。

trans-unit.source: Note that this method is intended for simple cases where it is convenient to read all lines in a single operation. It is not intended for reading in large files.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,这种方法只适用于简单的情况,在这种情况下,一次操作就可以方便地读取所有的行。它不用于读取大文件。

trans-unit.source: Note that this method is intended for simple cases where it is convenient to read the specified number of bytes into a byte array. The total amount of memory allocated by this method is proportional to the number of bytes read from the stream which is bounded by len. Therefore, the method may be safely called with very large values of len provided sufficient memory is available.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此方法仅用于简单的情况，在这种情况下，将指定数量的字节读入字节数组很方便。用此方法分配的内存总量与从流中读取的字节数成比例，该字节数由 len 限制。因此，只要有足够的内存可用，就可以使用非常大的 len 值安全地调用该方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that this method is not the complement of the exists method. Where it is not possible to determine if a file exists or not then both methods return false. As with the exists method, the result of this method is immediately outdated. If this method indicates the file does exist then there is no guarantee that a subsequent attempt to create the file will succeed. Care should be taken when using this method in security sensitive applications.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此方法不是 exists 方法的补充。如果无法确定文件是否存在，则这两种方法都将返回 false 。与 exists 方法一样，该方法的结果立即过时了。如果此方法指示文件确实存在，则不能保证随后的创建文件的尝试都会成功。在对安全敏感的应用程序中使用此方法时，应格外小心。

trans-unit.source: Note that this method is not the complement of the exists method. Where it is not possible to determine if a file exists or not then both methods return false. As with the exists method, the result of this method is immediately outdated. If this method indicates the file does exist then there is no guarantee that a subsequence attempt to create the file will succeed. Care should be taken when using this method in security sensitive applications.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此方法不是 exists 方法的补充。如果无法确定文件是否存在，则这两种方法都将返回 false 。与 exists 方法一样，此方法的结果立即过时。如果此方法指示文件确实存在，则不能保证创建该文件的子序列尝试将成功。在对安全敏感的应用程序中使用此方法时应小心。

trans-unit.source: Note that this method is public but is used by the look and feel engine and should not be called by client applications.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,这个方法是公开的,但被外观引擎使用,不应该被客户端应用程序调用。

trans-unit.source: Note that this method is security checked and is not available to (for example) untrusted applets. More specifically, if there is a security manager, its checkPropertiesAccess method is called. This could result in a SecurityException.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，此方法已经过安全检查，不适用于（例如）不受信任的applet。更具体地说，如果存在安全管理器，则将调用其 checkPropertiesAccess 方法。这可能会导致SecurityException。
